Functions
fza_fnc_engineGetTarget
Description

Returns what the RPM the engine should go to, and in what time

Parameters
_heli

The apache helicopter to get information from [Unit].

_engNum

The engine number that data should be retrieved for, 0 or 1.

Returns

[Target RPM, Time]

Examples
_target = [_heli, 0] call fza_fnc_engineGetTarget;
//_target => [21109, 2]
Author

mattysmith22
